pageProduct.name: Amazonia Raw Protein Pregnancy Plus Smooth Vanilla 750g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

If you are trying to conceive, already pregnant or breastfeeding, Amazonia Raw Protein Pregnancy Plus has been formulated with all the essential wholefood nutrients to support and nourish you during this time. When you are pregnant or breastfeeding your body requires higher levels of protein to support yourself and your baby. This blend contains 24g of organic, fermented plant Protein, plus 14 naturally sourced vitamins and minerals, including Zinc to help with fertility and reproduction, Iron, Folate and B Vitamins. With added organic Ginger and Dietary Fibre, Raw Protein Pregnancy Plus is the protein you need to help prepare your body for pregnancy and support you and your growing baby.

Warnings

Formulated Supplementary Food. Formulated to supplement a normal diet and address situations where intakes of energy and nutrients may not be adequate to meet an individual's requirements.

Common Uses

24g Fermented plant protein to support increased requirements during pregnancy 14+ Wholefood vitamins & minerals naturally sourced from fruit & vegetables Zinc to aid with fertility & reproduction Iron for normal neurological development in the foetus Folate to support maternal tissue growth during pregnancy B Vitamins to support hormone regulation, energy levels & immunity Source of Dietary Fibre to help keep you regular during pregnancy Vegan, non-synthetic, heavy metal tested

Ingredients

Organic Sprouted & Fermented Golden Pea Protein*, Vitamin & Mineral Blend (Organic Lucuma*, Sea Mineral Complex [74+ Trace Minerals], Marine Magnesium, Organic Ginger*, Spinach Extract, Broccoli Extract, Carrot Extract, Beetroot Extract, Tomato Extract, Shiitake Mushroom Extract, Apple Extract, Cranberry Extract, Cherry Extract, Orange Extract, Blueberry Extract, Strawberry Extract), Organic Sprouted Pea Fibre*, Natural Flavours, Organic Acacia Gum*, Organic Stevia Leaf Extract*.

Directions

Mix 4 heaped tablespoons (35g) into 300ml of cold water in a shaker. Can also be taken with non-dairy milk or blended into smoothies
